mapper.select: select case when IFNULL(b.quota,0) > count(a.id) then '1' else '0' end as "canSign" from esale_user_activity a ,esale_activity b where a.activity_id =b.id and b.id =#{id} and a.enroll_type in('0','1') and a.data_state=1 and b.data_state=1
